General.Name: Empower Clinics Inc
General.Description: Empower Clinics Inc., an integrated healthcare company, provides body and mind wellness services for patients through medical clinics, digital and telemedicine care, and medical diagnostics laboratories in the United States and Canada. The company also distributes medical devices. Empower Clinics Inc. was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1771 Robson Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6G 1C9

4.Name: Ms. Carolyn  Shields
4.Title: Sr. VP of Operations for The Medi-Collective
